title: What are the best VR & AR Podcasts I can listen to? - Quora

response.answer_text: Voices of VR Podcast The Voices of VR podcast is by far your greatest one stop shop for all things in the metaverse. Hosted by Kent Bye, who has traveled to the top VR gatherings around the world since May 2014 to bring you a diverse range of VR perspectives and insights from over 500 makers and seasoned academics. Voices of VR is a virtual, augmented and mixed reality treasure of the latest news and complex topics in the industry. Kent has created over 620 episodes with different thought leaders and decisions makers in the virtual reality industry. Available on iTunes and Stitcher Radio. UploadVR UploadVR was started in May 2015 with a simple mission, to accelerate the growth of the VR/AR industry and use immersive technology to make a positive global impact. UploadVR believes virtual reality and augmented reality are going to bring data into three dimensions, unlocking the next platform of computing. UploadVR is a media site that pushes VR forward with conferences, events, community, daily news coverage, talent placement, corporate connections, content creation, and more. Upload is by far one of the largest online publications with frequent articles on a daily basis and over 2 million website visitors. VR Roundtable Podcast Founded in 2016, Anthony Norcia and Gary Walkden identified a lacking presence in VR gaming dedicated podcasts. Being enthusiasts themselves, they began a weekly youtube video podcast. After a small handful of episodes, and want to fill out the “roundtable” more, Steve Bishop joined as a guest and transitioned to full-time host. Since that time VR Roundtable has organically grown to include “Let’s Play” and “Deep Dive” segments. VR Roundtable is usually published around once a week. Tune in to take an in-depth look at upcoming virtual reality games, and interesting developer topics in the industry. Road to VR Founded in 2011, Road to VR is one of the top independent news publication dedicated to consumer virtual reality (VR) industry. Road to VR features a popular Daily Roundup of the latest in the VR industry. Check out Road to VR’s website for the best VR Headset reviews and the latest immersive virtual games. Road to VR has even teamed up with Avadirect to create their own computer dedicated to powering intense virtual reality gameplay.  Everything VR & AR Podcast Everything VR & AR is a weekly podcast covering technologists, enthusiasts, and companies with real world deployments of VR and AR experiences. Learn from interviews with the leaders in gaming, entertainment, productivity, enterprise, social, education, medicine, software, hardware, psychology and more. You can rely on this podcast to give you your weekly virtual reality fulfillment and enjoyment! The host, Nathan Pettyjohn, has been featured on CNBC, The Wall Street Journal, and Bloomberg as a technology entrepreneur. He speaks frequently at industry conferences on VR/AR/MR, location and digital media technologies and how they are transforming business strategies.
